Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Mercure Ile De Nantes in Nantes, you'll be convenient to Hospital Saint Jacques and Jardin des Plantes. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of La Cite Nantes Event Center and Le Lieu Unique.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 100 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar and a pool view. You can also stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Nantes? This hotel has facilities measuring 1141 square feet (106 square meters), including meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar and a pool view. You can also stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Mercure Ile De Nantes in Nantes, you'll be convenient to Hospital Saint Jacques and Jardin des Plantes. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of La Cite Nantes Event Center and Le Lieu Unique.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Hospital Saint Jacques - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
La Cite Nantes Event Center - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Le Lieu Unique - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Jardin des Plantes - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Chateau des Ducs de Bretagne - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Hotel Dieu Hospital - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Beaux-Arts Museum - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
University of Nantes - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Place du Bouffray - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Nantes Cathedral - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Place du Marechal Foch - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Place du Commerce - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Place Royale - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Passage Pommeraye - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Cours Cambronne - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
Nantes (QJZ-Nantes SNCF Train Station) - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Nantes (NTE-Nantes - Atlantique) - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi

The preferred airport for Mercure Ile De Nantes is Nantes (NTE-Nantes - Atlantique).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Mercure Ile De Nantes is Nantes (NTE-Nantes - Atlantique) - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi.
